content.rendered:
IT’S PRADA OR NADA

With the latest trend obsession, we’re going back to the always minimalistic and cool ’90s. During the ’90s Prada nylon bags were everything! It was the hottest must-have bag alongside the Fendi baguette bag. Prada has always been popular since the ’90s, but in 2019-2020 it’s now even more popular with all the top Instagram influencers and fashion bloggers sporting vintage Prada nylon bags on Instagram. Prada bags are a hot item..but vintage nylon Prada bags are selling like hotcakes!

The best Prada bag to invest in is a classic black nylon style with a small logo on the front of the bag. If you really want to splurge I would go for the leather shoulder bags with a clean upscale modern look….or a leather bag with a gold chain.

The Prada bags above can be purchased from Prada.com, Nordstrom.com, Saks.com…as well as many other retailers.

For the best vintage Prada bags I recommend TheRealReal.com. They have the best collections and always add new styles with great price options.

P.S. Book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. New D’Lashes products have arrived!

 

XO XO, DIONNE
